publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology "

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim

ab.title: Judges 17
ab.l: Da ėdi kiši tavynda Ėfrajimniń da aty anyn Miḫajehu .
Da ajtty anasyna miń juź ḱuḿuš́ńu ki alyndy saja da śeń antet́tiń daɣy ajttyj qulaḥlarymč́a muna ol ḱuḿuš́ birǵaḿa ḿeń aldym any da ajtty anasy alɣyšly bolɣejsiń uv- lum H-ɣa.
Da qajttyrdy miń da juź ḱuḿuš́ńu anasyna da ajtty anasy ajryḥsy ėt́ḿa ajryḥsy ėt́tim ol ḱu- ḿuš́ńu H-ɣa qolumdan uvluma qylma qujɣan abaḥ da haĺegińa qajttyramyn any saja.
Da qajttyrdy ol ḱuḿuš́ńu anasyna da aldy anasy ėki juź ḱuḿuš́ da b́erdi any al- tynčyɣa da qyldy qujɣan abaḥ da ėdi üv́uńd́a Miḫajehunun.

Da ol kišiǵa Miḥaɣa ėdi anar üv́u T́eńriniń da qyldy ėfod da sturlaplar da tolturdu qolun birni ulanlaryndan da boldu
anar kohen ornuna.
Ol vaḥtlarda joɣedi bij Jiśraʾeĺd́a kiši ki qylɣej ol t́uź ḱoŕuńǵańni ėnajatlarynda H-nyn.
Da ėdi ulan B́et́ Ĺeḥemińdá Juhudanyn uruvundan Juhudanyn da ol Ĺevili da tirildi anda.
Da bardy ol kiši ol šahardan B́et́ Ĺeḥemińden Juhudanyn tiriĺḿa qajda ki tapsa da keĺdi tavyna Ėfrajimniń üv́uńa d́ejiń Miḫanyn qylma jolun.
Da ajtty anar Miḫa qajdan keĺasiń da ajtty anar Ĺevili ḿeń B́et́ Ĺeḥemińd́ań Juhudanyn da ḿeń baramyn tiriĺḿa qajda ki tapsam.
Da ajtty anar Miḫa oltur- ɣun bu orunda birǵeḿa da bolusen maja ata ornuna da kohen ornuna da ḿeń b́erirmiń saja on ḱuḿuš́ jylɣa da keŕagiń upraḥlarnyn da jemijni da bardy ol Ĺevili.
Da kuvuĺńadi ol Ĺevili olturma ol kiši byla da ėdi ol ulan anar birisi kibik ulanlaryndan.
Da tolturdu Miḫa qolun ol Ĺeviliniń da boldu anar ol ulan kohenǵa da ėdi üv́uńd́a Miḫanyn.
Da ajtty Miḫa haĺegińa biĺamiń ki jaḥšy ėt́ar H maja ki bolur maja ol Ĺevili kohen ornuna.

app.note: The sof pasuq punctuation mark is missing.
F305-01: miń ol juź ḱuḿuš́ńu, a scribal error, possibly with a transposition of words, cf. TKow.02: osol min da iz ol kimis. Cf. also Heb. אֶת־אֶלֶף־וּמֵאָה הַכֶּסֶף.
A redundant sof pasuq punktuation mark. The copyist erroneously attached the final part of Judg 17.10 to 17.11.
